section.name: Deployment
section.p: RSB should deploy fine on any Java web-container supporting Servlet 2.5.

section.name: Configuration
section.p: RSB is configured with a unique JSON file named rsb-configuration.json, which must be located at the root of the JVM classpath.

subsection.name: Samples
subsection.p: Here are a few examples of configuration files:

ul.li: Minimal configuration: shows the required configuration entries
Redis statistics store: shows a minimal configuration with an optional Redis statistics store configured
Full configuration: shows a complete configuration with examples for all the different job deposit methods
